name: Routing Valerie
description:
Entry for the Student Game Jam.

 This is a  prototype of Valerie Project.

 Learn with Valerie the concepts of IP Routing.

 Credits:

  • 2D graphics and concept Art: Elena García Bravo
  • Backend programming: Rafael Rodríguez Gómez
  • Technical design: Antonio Bailón Morillas
  • Music and FX: Alberto Guillén Perales
  • Script and storytelling: Pablo García Sánchez
  • Backup programming: Juanjo Ramos

Made with Godot Engine 4.0.
